errors.wrongPassword: Wrong password or passphrase for the account with the provided username.
errors.shortPassword: Password or passphrase should be at least 8 characters.
errors.invalidCode: Code is invalid. Please try again.
errors.noAccount: You cannot receive the code because there is no account with the provided username.
errors.noEmails: You cannot receive the code because there is no e-mail address associated with the provided username.

shortEmailOrUsername.email: E-mail address should be at least 3 characters.
shortEmailOrUsername.username: Username should be at least 3 characters.

credentialInUse.username: Username is already in use by another account.

alreadyPresent.email: This email is already present on this account.
alreadyPresent.username: This username is already present on this account.
alreadyPresent.password: This password or passphrase is already present on this account.

errors.credentialLabelInUse: Credential label is already in use.

AuthAutoRedirect.congratulations: {strongCongratulations} Everything is ready to sign you in or sign you up into {appName} using the identity you have chosen.
AuthAutoRedirect.declined: You decided to {strongDeclineSignInOrSignUp} into {appName} using Charon.
AuthAutoRedirect.redirectMessage: You will be now redirected to {appName} in {time}{pausedText}.

AuthCode.codeSentEmail: We {sentCount} a 6-digit code to {strongEmail} e-mail address. Please enter it to continue:
AuthCode.codeSentUsername: We {sentCount} a 6-digit code to e-mail address(es) associated with the Charon username {strongUsername}. Please enter it to continue:
AuthCode.codeFromHashEmail: We sent the following 6-digit code to {strongEmail} e-mail address:
AuthCode.codeFromHashUsername: We sent the following 6-digit code to e-mail address(es) associated with the Charon username {strongUsername}:
AuthCode.confirmCode: Please confirm the code to continue.
AuthCode.waitForCode: Please allow few minutes for the code to arrive. Check spam or junk folder.
AuthCode.securityWarning: If you were not signing in or signing up into {appName}, please disregard the e-mail and {strongDont} confirm the code.
AuthCode.troubleEmail: If you have trouble accessing your e-mail, try a {linkDifferentMethod}.

AuthIdentity.signinSuccess: {strongCongratulations} You successfully signed in into Charon.
AuthIdentity.signupSuccess: {strongCongratulations} You successfully signed up into Charon.
AuthIdentity.previouslyUsedDisabled: Previously used identities with this organization are disabled.
AuthIdentity.noOtherIdentitiesCreateOne: There are no other identities. Create one.
AuthIdentity.selectInstructions: Select the identity you want to continue with. Its information will be provided to the app and the organization. You can also create a new identity or decline to proceed.
AuthIdentity.identitiesUsedWithOrg: Identities used with the organization, but not the app
AuthIdentity.noIdentityUsed: You have not yet used any identity with this organization.
AuthIdentity.noIdentityUsedWithApp: You have not yet used any identity with this app in the organization.
AuthIdentity.allPreviousDisabled: All previously used identities with this organization are disabled.

AuthManualRedirect.failed: {strongSorry} Signing in or signing up failed.
AuthManualRedirect.tryAgain: You can return to {appName} and try again.
AuthManualRedirect.completed: You have already been redirected to {appName} and completed the flow. You can now instead go to its homepage.

AuthPasskeySignin.signingIn: Signing you in using {strongPasskey}. Please follow instructions by your browser and/or device.
AuthPasskeySignin.signupInfo: If you have not yet signed up with passkey, this will fail. In that case Charon will offer you to sign up instead.

AuthPasskeySignup.instructions: Signing in using {strongPasskey} failed. Do you want to sign up instead?
AuthPasskeySignup.signingUp: Signing you up using {strongPasskey}. Please follow instructions by your browser and/or device.
AuthPasskeySignup.signupInfo: If you have already signed up with passkey, this will sign you up again and create another Charon account for you.

AuthPassword.emailAccount: If you do not yet have an account, it will be created for you. If you enter wrong password or passphrase, recovery will be done automatically for you by sending you a code to your e-mail address.
AuthPassword.usernameAccount: If you do not yet have an account, it will be created for you. Username will not be visible to others, but it is possible to determine if an account with a username exists or not. If you enter wrong password or passphrase, recovery will be done automatically for you by sending you a code to e-mail address(es) associated with the username, if any.
AuthPassword.skipPassword: You can also skip entering password or passphrase and directly request the code.
AuthPassword.troublePassword: If you have trouble remembering your password or passphrase, try a {linkDifferentSigninMethod}.

AuthStart.emailOrUsernameLabel: Enter Charon username or your e-mail address

AuthThirdPartyProvider.redirectMessage: You will be redirected to {strongProvider} in {time}{pausedText}.
AuthThirdPartyProvider.instructions: Please follow instructions there to sign-in into Charon. Afterwards, you will be redirected back here.
AuthThirdPartyProvider.additionalInfo: You might have to sign-in into {provider} first. You might be redirected back by {provider} immediately, without showing you anything.

CredentialAddPasskey.label: @:partials.CredentialAddPassword.label
CredentialAddPasskey.passkeyInstructions: Your device will prompt you to create a passkey. This allows you to sign in without a password.

ApplicationTemplateCreate.chooseApplicationTemplateName: Choose a name. You will be able to configure the application template after it is created.

ApplicationTemplateGet.spaceSeparatedScopes: Space-separated OpenID scopes the app might request
ApplicationTemplateGet.name: Name
ApplicationTemplateGet.spaceSeparatedAdditionalScopes: Space-separated additional scopes the client might request

ApplicationTemplateList.noApplicationTemplatesCreate: There are no application templates. Create the first one.
ApplicationTemplateList.noApplicationTemplatesSignIn: There are no application templates. Sign-in or sign-up to create the first one.

AuthFlowGet.instructionsMessage: {appLink} from organization {orgLink} is using Charon to ask you to sign-in or sign-up. Please follow the steps below to do so, or to decline.

IdentityList.noIdentitiesCreate: There are no identities. Create the first one.
IdentityList.noIdentitiesSignIn: There are no identities. Sign-in or sign-up to create the first one.

OrganizationCreate.chooseOrganizationName: Choose a name. You will be able to configure the organization after it is created.

OrganizationList.noOrganizationsCreate: There are no organizations. Create the first one.
OrganizationList.noOrganizationsSignIn: There are no organizations. Sign-in or sign-up to create the first one.

OrganizationBlockUser.blockConfirmation: Are you sure you want to block this user in the organization?
OrganizationBlockUser.blockOnlyIdentity: Block only this identity from accessing the organization
OrganizationBlockUser.blockIdentityAndAccounts: Block this identity and all other identities controlled by the same user or users from accessing the organization
OrganizationBlockUser.userNote: Note to blocked user or users

CredentialList.noCredentialsCreate: No authentication methods configured. Create the first one.
CredentialList.noCredentialsSignIn: There are no authentication methods. Sign-in or sign-up to create the first one.
